<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<mx:WindowedApplication xmlns:mx="http://www.adobe.com/2006/mxml" layout="absolute" backgroundColor="#323232" 
    width="100%" height="100%">
    <mx:Script>
        <![CDATA[
            import mx.collections.ArrayCollection;
            import mx.collections.IViewCursor;
            import mx.controls.Alert;
            
            import com.fwscott.webapis.smugmug.v1_2_0.*;
            import com.fwscott.webapis.smugmug.v1_2_0.events.SmugMugResultEvent;
            import com.fwscott.webapis.smugmug.v1_2_0.methodgroups.Albums;
            
            [Bindable]
            private var service:SmugMugService;
            
            [Bindable]
            private var albumsColl:ArrayCollection;
            [Bindable]
            private var imagesColl:ArrayCollection;
            
            private var curs:IViewCursor;
            private var currentAlbumId:String;
            private var currentAlbumKey:String;
            
            [Bindable]
            private var currentAlbumName:String;
            private var photoId:String;
            private var photoKey:String;
            
            [Bindable]
            private var nickname:String;
            
            [Bindable]
            
            private function onLogin():void {
                service = new SmugMugService("PUT-YOUR-KEY-HERE",false);
                service.addEventListener(SmugMugResultEvent.LOGIN_WITHPASSWORD, onLoginResult);
                service.addEventListener(SmugMugResultEvent.ALBUMS_GET, onAlbumsGet);
                service.login.withPassword(userid.text,pw.text);
            }
            
            private function onLoginResult(event:SmugMugResultEvent):void {
                if (event.success) {
                    nickname = event.data.login.Login.User.NickName;
                    service.albums.get();
                    this.userLoggedIn.text=nickname+" successfully logged in";
                }
                else {
                    this.userLoggedIn.text = "Not logged in";
                    Alert.show("Userid not a valid SmugMug account, please enter full SmugMug email address.");
                }
            }
            private function onAlbumsGet(event:SmugMugResultEvent):void {
                if (event.success) {
                    albumsColl = new ArrayCollection(event.data.Albums);
                    curs = albumsColl.createCursor();
                    service.addEventListener(SmugMugResultEvent.IMAGES_GET,onImagesGet);
                    var currentAlbum:Object = curs.current;
                    currentAlbumId = currentAlbum.id;
                    currentAlbumKey = currentAlbum.Key;
                    currentAlbumName = currentAlbum.title;
                    service.images.get(currentAlbum.id,currentAlbum.Key,false);
                }
                else Alert.show("Error occurred retrieving albums: " + event.data);
            }
            private function onImagesGet(event:SmugMugResultEvent):void {
                if (event.success)
                    imagesColl = new ArrayCollection(event.data.Images);
                else Alert.show("Error occurred retrieving images: " + event.data);
            }
            public function createUrl(photoId:String, photoKey:String):String
            {
                // Create the URL based on the photo info to the thumbnail
                var url:String = "http://"+nickname+".smugmug.com/photos/"+photoId+"_"+photoKey+"-Th.jpg";
                return url;
            }
            public function createBigUrl(photoId:String, photoKey:String):String
            {
                // Create the URL to the large version of the photo
                var url:String = "http://"+nickname+".smugmug.com/photos/"+photoId+"_"+photoKey+"-L.jpg";
                return url;
            }
            public function getImages(evt:Event):void
            {
                service.addEventListener(SmugMugResultEvent.IMAGES_GET,onImagesGet);
                var selAlbum:Object = albumList.selectedItem;
                currentAlbumId = selAlbum.id;
                currentAlbumKey = selAlbum.Key;
                currentAlbumName = selAlbum.title;
                service.images.get(selAlbum.id,selAlbum.Key,false);
            }
            
        ]]>
    </mx:Script>
    
    <mx:Canvas width="100%" height="100%">
    <mx:Form x="1" y="1" defaultButton="{btn}"  paddingTop="0" paddingBottom="0" color="#FFFFFF">
        <mx:FormHeading label="SmugMug Login"/>
            <mx:FormItem label="Userid:">
                <mx:TextInput id="userid" width="200" color="#000000"/>
            </mx:FormItem>
            <mx:FormItem label="Password:">
                <mx:TextInput id="pw" width="200" displayAsPassword="true" color="#000000"/>
            </mx:FormItem>
            <mx:FormItem>
                <mx:Button id="btn" label="Login" click="onLogin()"/>
            </mx:FormItem>
        </mx:Form>

    <mx:Text x="400" y="50" id="userLoggedIn" color="white" text="Not logged in"/>
    
    <mx:Panel x="1" y="120" title="{(nickname!=null)?nickname+'\'s '+'Photo Galleries':''}" color="#FFFFFF" borderColor="#5C5C5C" borderAlpha="3.0" width="100%" height="100%">
        <mx:HDividedBox width="100%" height="100%" color="#000000" >
                <mx:List id="albumList" dataProvider="{albumsColl}" itemClick="getImages(event)" labelField="Title" width="30%" height="100%"/>
                <mx:TileList id="imageList" dataProvider="{imagesColl}" labelField="id" width="70%" height="100%" rowCount="6" rowHeight="75" columnWidth="75"  
                     rollOverColor="#007ECD" selectionColor="#336699" toolTip="Double click to view larger image" 
                    doubleClickEnabled="true" doubleClick="navigateToURL(new URLRequest(createBigUrl(imageList.selectedItem.id,imageList.selectedItem.Key)))">
                    <mx:itemRenderer>
                        <mx:Component>
                            <mx:Image source="{outerDocument.createUrl(data.id,data.Key)}" horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"/>
                        </mx:Component>
                    </mx:itemRenderer>
                </mx:TileList>
          </mx:HDividedBox>
    </mx:Panel>
        
    </mx:Canvas>
</mx:WindowedApplication>
